name: Hi Sai 3d Tower Defense Mobile Game
name_original: Hi Sai 3d Tower Defense Mobile Game
description:
Hi Sai is a tower defense serious game and  it was our graduation project at ITI for GIZ and in Cooperation with WHO (world health organization) where i worked with talented people .

in this  game  your`e going to build and set defenses and fight hordes of enemies
the Game is an output of one month of work and the game is still in development but 

hope you enjoy 

Thanks.
